welcome_message_body: Welcome to West Rembo, the hidden gem of the Philippines known for its vibrant culture and breathtaking views. Get ready to experience the warmth and charm of our city and immerse yourself in all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and don't forget to explore and discover all the wonders of West Rembo.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, this serves as the main hub for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Formerly known as the Domestic Terminal, this serves as the hub for budget airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi for 2 hours per day. Additional usage can be purchased.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Baler Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, free for passengers.
